channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Women who have experienced stalking have a higher risk of heart disease, study shows
item.description: A big, new study shows women who are victims of stalking are at significantly higher risk of heart disease.

item.title: The emotional impact of cancer on men

item.title: A Guide To Finding Insurance at 26‌
item.description: It’s a difficult rite of passage for young adults without job-based insurance. Here are some tips for getting started.

item.title: Why Young Americans Dread Turning 26: Health Insurance Chaos
item.description: Young adults without jobs that provide insurance find their options are limited and expensive. The problem is about to get worse.
